# Assignment 1 

```r 
echo = TRUE
circle_image <- image_read("https://www.kindpng.com/picc/m/0-8093_heart-png-image-cute-heart-png-pink-broken.png") %>%
  image_scale(500)

# creating each frame, where the text comes from the counts vector
frame1 <- circle_image %>%
  image_annotate(text = "I", size = 80, gravity = "center") %>%
  image_scale(400) %>%
  image_extent("500x500")

frame2 <- circle_image %>%
  image_annotate(text = "really", size = 80, gravity = "center") %>%
  image_scale(300) %>%
  image_extent("500x500")

frame3 <- circle_image %>%
  image_annotate(text = "love", size = 80, gravity = "center") %>%
  image_scale(200) %>%
  image_extent("500x500")

frame4 <- circle_image %>%
  image_annotate(text = "you", size = 80, gravity = "center") %>%
  image_scale(400)

# putting the frames in order using a vector
frames <- c(frame1, frame2, frame3, frame4)

# creating an animation
image_animate(frames, fps = 1)
```
